lead_paragraph: Chris Froome's hopes of becoming the first rider in 38 years to win the Tour de France and Tour of Spain in the same year were hit by a terrible display in stage 15 on Sunday when he finished two minutes 40 seconds adrift of winner Gianluca Brambilla.

headline.print_headline: Cycling: Froome Struggles to Stay in Contention After Dismal Stage
headline.main: Cycling: Froome Struggles to Stay in Contention After Dismal Stage
